TEXT:
Using guro. (after restart the game). 
Choosing this option indicates that you have accepted the fact that you will encounter a large amount of guro content. 
It includes blood, violence, excrement, or other content that may cause discomfort, 
And when you encounter guro content that makes you discomfort, you will not insult the author or ask the author to remove the content.
Only display cards that belong exclusively to this character in the Card Encyclopedia, rather than all available cards for that character.
Turn on performance mode. Some special effects may be weakened.
[还没做好]切换模式后，点击本按钮刷新本地化资源（部分可能需要重启）
You can open #gSFW to play with #rguro content, or close #gSFW with #rguro opened. NL Please check the mod setting.
